name: Steelpaw Adventure
description:
make friends, fight foes, go on an adventure

This game is currently in progress, constructive feedback is welcome and appreciated

controls (PC/PS4)
  • move - WASD / Left Stick
  • look - Mouse / Right Stick
  • lock-on - Q / R3
    Locks onto the nearest target
  • jump - Space / Cross
  • melee - Left Mouse Button / Square
    HOLD until you hear a ping for a charged attack
  • dash - Shift / R2
  • view objective - Tab / Touchpad button
combat tipz

attacking and dashing cost stamina. stamina recovers while standing on the ground and not taking action.

holding the attack button charges your attack/combo, however charging your attack costs additional stamina, and you cannot walk or jump while doing so.

however, at the cost of stamina you can dash at any time to immediately change your velocity in any direction. this means that you can charge an attack, and dash to close distance to your opponent before your attack deploys.

charged attacks are countered by headbutts. if you dash into an opponent you will perform a headbutt and cancel their attack.

headbutts are countered by fast attacks. if you take damage while dashing, you will be temporarily stunned. melee attacks will deploy faster if you do not charge first.
